sentences.sContent: ...the presupposition that human life must be sustained for as long as possible.
sentences.sCn: ...必须让人的生命得以尽可能延长的这种假设。

remMethod.val: pre(预先) + supposition(假定， 推测) → 预先推测 → 预想， 臆测

words.tran: 假定；预料；以…为先决条件

trans.tranOther: something that you think is true, although you have no proof
